Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Set up project structure and configuration

Initialize JobHunter project with folder structure, dependencies, and configuration files for Phase 1 Step 1:
- Create app structure with scrapers, services, templates, and static folders
- Add requirements.txt with all necessary dependencies \(Flask, Selenium, APScheduler, Anthropic API\)
- Add .env.example template with API keys and configuration variables
- Add config.py with search criteria, filters, and target companies
- Update .gitignore to exclude database files, logs, and sensitive data

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
